nodes.name: MintableToken

nodes.documentation: @dev Constructor to pass the finMigrationContract address to the Claimable constructor
@dev Allows addresses with FIN migration records to claim thier ERC20 FIN tokens. This is the only way minting can occur.
nodes.name: claim
mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to stop all minting of new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: finishMinting
